function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Long-term impact of covid-19 on construction projects","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low weighted average scores in group ratings","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived status changes between rounds","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preparedness ratings for handling the impact of covid-19","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Correlation analyses used to evaluate association between quantitative variables","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumptions for kruskal-wallis h test may not have been met","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No statistically significant difference in impact score between rounds in group a","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Higher average scores for software and hardware in group a compared to group b may indicate unequal access to technology for remote work.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in the perceived impact of covid-19 on the construction industry between group a and group b may reflect variations in experiences and perspectives related to the pandemic.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants from different countries with varying levels of impact from covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased working time for group b participants in the initial survey round","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in remote work capabilities over survey rounds","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilizing a small sample size of 97 subjects may lead to a lack of generalizability of the findings.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Collecting survey responses during the covid-19 pandemic may introduce bias due to the impact of the pandemic on respondents’ perspectives and behaviors.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using a cross-sectional approach may overlook the dynamic nature of the covid-19 situation, leading to limited insights into longitudinal changes.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction professionals may have varied perceptions of the covid-19 impact on construction, leading to a lack of consensus in response planning.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global and regional differences in perceived impacts of covid-19 on construction may lead to localized response plans that do not account for broader patterns of disease propagation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceptions of professionals at different points in time may not accurately reflect the evolving nature of the pandemic, leading to outdated response plans.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in supply chains","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ambiguity and inconsistencies in covid-19 statistics due to economic expediencies and ambiguous behavior of the virus","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Forced stoppage of construction projects leading to fiscal losses for both big and small construction companies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impacts of covid-19 on the supply chain system, leading to operational and disruption risks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of construction projects due to epidemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial losses in construction companies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unreliable space for foreign direct investment fdi in construction projects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial strain on self-employed individuals due to lockdowns","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption of the construction industry due to covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in immigrant workers impacting construction projects","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in perception of pandemic impact between developed and developing countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adverse effects of covid-19 on the global economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fallout in working hours due to pandemic impact","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks and adverse effects of covid-19 on tunnel construction sites","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on construction professionals’ performance","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction professionals interacting with covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Multiple rounds of surveys conducted with construction professionals","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global contagion of covid-19 impacting construction professionals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of critical reflexivity in urban soundscapes research","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of the impact of digital methodologies on public health","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited representation of diverse experiences in the podcast, particularly those of minority groups and marginalized voices.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tightly controlled production environment may lead to a false sense of security and neglect of potential risks.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sampling strategy targeting a particular group may limit the representation of diverse experiences and perspectives.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of generalizability in qualitative research may restrict the applicability of insights to broader contexts and populations.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"International collaboration involving 25 academics creates potential for transmission of contagious diseases across borders.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Podcasting project involves close contact between academics, increasing the risk of transmitting contagious diseases within the academic community.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close proximity and interaction between individuals in the streets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Attentiveness to non-human others and the more-than-human city","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Familiarity with lockdown measures leading to complacency","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global circulation of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban soundscape linked to covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in suburban streets due to increased pedestrian, jogger, and cyclist activity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
